text: Bert Bosman (1 July 1945 – 20 January 2023) was a Dutch footballer who played as a left winger. Bosman started his career with and . After playing in the under-19 team he played with the main team in the Tweede Divisie. He signed a professional contract with in 1968. He played and scored among others at 1970–71 KNVB Cup. He played three seasons for the club until 1971. He moved back to VV Zwartemeer where he retired as a footballer in 1972. After his playing career he was a football trainier until the 1990s for several amateur clubs. Bosman worked as a hairdresser in the 1960s and 1970s at “Jan Bosman” in Klazienaveen. He died in his hometown Emmen on 20 January 2023, at the age of 77. ==References== Category:Dutch footballers Category:1945 births Category:2023 deaths
title: Bert Bosman
